ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.5_0: The training rule on teaching pointless knowledge
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.2_0: The nuns from the group of six taught pointless knowledge.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.3_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.4_0: “How can the nuns teach pointless knowledge? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six do this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, those nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun uses pointless knowledge, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.6_0: whatever is external to the Buddha’s Teaching, not connected with the goal.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.8_0: if she teaches by the line, then for every line she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.9_0: If she teaches by the syllable, then for every syllable she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.10.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.12_0: if he tells or has it prepared;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.13_0: if she teaches verses for the purpose of protection;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.15_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.16_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.17_0: The fifth sub-chapter on pleasure houses is finished.
